name: ZenCell
description:
Zen, focus.

A tiled board of numbered colours. Each tile must be either the same number or one above or below its neighbouring numbers. Not all tiles accept all numbers, so you must plan carefully and choose a strategy that won't have you backtracking and wasting valuable points.

Finish the puzzle in the fewest clicks (try aiming for 100,000 points!), but most importantly, relax.

Stressed? Angry? Need to unwind? Let my infinite, methodical mind-bogglers massage your mental muscles.
